lang.t: Psychosis Dementia Agony Drink Sleep Blood Rage hate Kill Kill them Murder Drugs Death awaits you You will die You'll die tonight Join the shadows Nightmares Mutilations No hope They're watching you They want you to die Trust No One Run away Don't listen to them They'll kill you Your neighbour wants you dead They want to hang you They're going to kill you You'll survive Taste their blood You're being watched They are CRAZY They'll take your skin Taste their flesh Eat one of them Kill one of them Make him pay take revenge Betray them No pity I'm not crazy I don't see anything They are mad Die Kill them all They will die Hope for their death Devour them Abandon
